dcterms:creator: Xin Chen
dcterms:description: A dataset for the control system of an inverted pendulum on a cart, widely used as a classic example of a nonlinear system. The dataset includes samples for training and testing the model, focusing on the safety property of keeping the pendulum upright.
dcterms:title: Inverted Pendulum Dataset

dcterms:creator: Eugene M. Izhikevich
dcterms:description: A dataset based on a spiking neuron model, which is a hybrid system with one mode and one jump. The dataset is used to analyze the safety property of the neuron not undershooting its resting potential.
dcterms:title: Spiking Neuron Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for the quadcopter model benchmark, focusing on the safety property that the quadcopter does not crash, ensuring positive altitude.
dcterms:title: Quadcopter Dataset
